name: Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader: Make the Grade
name_original: Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader: Make the Grade
description:
Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader: Make the Grade is a game developed by ImaginEngine. It was originally released in 2008. ValuSoft published the game.
Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader: Make the Grade is available on PC.
It was directed by Don Weiner.
